body.name: Sweet Watermelon Water Bottle Double Walled Stainless Steel Leak Proof Thermo Flask for Sports Gym Cycling Outdoor,33 oz.
features: 【🍻MATERIAL】: Insulated water bottle with high-quality stainless steel double wall vacuum structure,the outside of the sports water bottle body is made of food-grade stainless steel outer material,which can be completely removed and washed,and does not contain BPA,which creates a very thermal insulation effect.Size: 600 ml/27.5*7.2 cm/10.8*2.8 inch;1000 ml/34*8.5 cm/13.38*3.3 inch.

【🍻VACUUM INSULATION】: Thermos water bottle with Food-grade stainless steel inner tank, the outer wall of the inner tank is equipped with a heat insulation layer, a vacuum temperature lock layer, and enhances the effect of cold and heat preservation.

【🍻LEAK-PROOF STRAW LIDS】: Water Bottle are Designed for easy drinking during travel and work, when the nozzle is in the closed position,thermos cap is leak-proof. Thermal bottle with straw design,easy to drink water,clean and hygienic;Insulate bottle is equipped with a vent valve to ensure air circulation,the new straw cap allows you to easily carry the thermos cup wherever you go, the top of the straw means no Risk of overflow.

【🍻EASY TO USE】: Portable water bottle with straw and handle when hiking, biking, shopping or leaving it in the office. When sitting anywhere at any temperature, thermal bottles for hot and cold drinks, your cold drink will remain perfectly refrigerated for up to 24 hours, or your coffee or tea will remain hot for up to 12 hours. Thermos bottle cup for kids girls women boys is a great gift for any occasion.

【🍻BEST GIFTS】: This stainless steel water bottle for girls, kids, boys,children, men, women, school, and it is a good choice for traveling,school,work,cycling,and biking,shopping,hiking,beach and so on.
body.description: SPECIFICATION Material: 304 stainless steel Capacity: 20oz (600ml) / 32oz(1000ml) Size: 27.5*7.2 cm / 10.8*2.8 inch ; 34*8.5 cm /13.38*3.3 inch 🙋Holding Time: Hot for 10 hours and cold for 24 hours FEATURES 💖High quality stainless steel double vacuum structure,good insulation effect 💖Sports water bottle is light and easy to carry, with wide handle position,can be easily lifted by two fingers USAGE 💞Minors should use it under the guidance of adults or after being notified 💞Rinse the cup with neutral detergent in warm water before use 💞In order to make the cup retain heat and keep cool,it is recommended to preheat or precool the cup by adding hot or ice water.Ice cubes work better when it's cold 💞To prevent leakage,please tighten the lid clockwise when the cup is tilted NOTE ✅The cup should not be over full when adding boiling water to prevent overflow and scalding ✅Avoid direct heating or high temperature. Do not heat the products in open fires, microwave ovens, induction stoves or dishwashers ✅Do not add dry ice, carbonated drinks and other liquids that are prone to high pressure in the vacuum cup,Do not add soy sauce, soup containing alkaline,acidic components of the liquid,so as to avoid the cup body corrosion ✅When cleaning,please use neutral detergent and warm water.Do not use alkaline bleach, chemical dishcloth and other cleaning agents ✅After loading into milk and other perishable drinks,please drink and clean as soon as possible,so as not to spoil and rot the inner bladder MONEY BACK GUARANTEE We devote to provide the best customer service and bring the best shopping experience to every our customer. If you are not satisfied with our product,contact us and we can offer a full refund.
